item.description:
Flogging Molly is returning to the House of Blues on Saturday night, 2/27/10.

Doors open at 6:00pm. But, we'll meet at Boston Beer Works at 5:00pm for a drink before the show.

* Boston Beer works is located between Lansdowne St and the Yawkey Way Neighborhood *

They are an awesome Celtic band, that is full of life, energy and fun!!
Everyday is St. Patricks Day when Floggy Molly is around!!

Drunken Lullabies
Video: http://www.youtube.co...

If I Ever Leave This World Alive
Video: http://www.youtube.co...

Seven Deadly Sins
Video: http://www.youtube.co...

Whistles the Wind
Video: http://www.youtube.co...

I thought it would be a lot of fun to post it as an event on this group, since WE are a FUN group of people.
And, I know we would have a great time at this show!!

This is a link the the event page.
http://www.houseofblu...

Get your tickets ASAP, because it's a very popular band, and they will likely sell out by mid December!!

Tickets are $26.00 for general admission (standing).

* It will be hard for us all to stay together as a group once we're inside the House of Blues, but we'll do our best.

After the show, if anyone wants to, we can get something to eat at Boston Beer Works or Pizzaria Uno.

I'll send out my contact information at noontime on the day of the event to people who have RSVP'd "Yes". If you know that you will not have access to email on the day of the event, be sure to email me to let me know and we can exchange contact information prior to that day. Thanks, Karen

Hope you can join us!!
item.name: Flogging Molly at the House of Blues
